title: How Is A YouTuber Running For London Mayor? | Ep.2
summary: Max Fosh explores how a YouTuber is running for London Mayor in this episode.
payoff: The humor comes from the absurdity of a YouTuber running for a serious political position and the reactions from those involved.
description: In this video, Max Fosh delves into the unconventional candidacy of a YouTuber running for London Mayor. He interviews the candidate, their team, and other political figures to uncover how this unlikely scenario came to be. Through his investigative comedy style, Max highlights the humorous and absurd aspects of the situation, ultimately leading to a surprising and entertaining conclusion.
